headline: Stanley Black & Decker Announces Board Leadership Changes and Appoints Shane M. O'Kelly as Director
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE: SWK), a global leader in tools and outdoor solutions, today announced updates to its Board of Directors, underscoring the Company's ongoing commitment to best-in-class governance and forward-thinking leadership to drive operational excellence across the organization.

headline: 3 Cash-Producing Stocks We Find Risky
